extendedInfo.description: "Let's play with knowledge!" is an educational game for kids, but not only!, made up of three mini games:- European Foreigners : words game; it supports italian, english, french and german. You have to "guess" the name of the background image touching the bouncing letters in the right order to form the word. There are 9 levels: Animals, Colours, Fruits, Vegetable, Transports, Jobs, Numbers, Nature and Verbs. To pass to the next level you have to guess at least a certain number of words.- Around the World : capitals game; it supports italian, european and world capitals. You have to reach the end of labyrinth correctly answering to the questions showed when you pass on "?" box.- Numbers Storm : math game.You have to assign the correct result to the major number of operations. There are 4 levels: addictions, subtractions, multiplications and divisions.*** ENJOY IT! :) ***

reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
reviews.comment: Omg!!! U need to try this game!. It\'s a wonderfull gaming experience drama and a fun it is filled with do go ahead and play it but u need to install the game first for free so do it now then u can have the time of your life playing ut
